prompts: Create a small, round Pokemon that has a cute appearance and is based on an owl.
I want a nature-loving Pokemon that can blend into its surroundings with green and brown colors.
Generate a starter Pokemon that evolves into a majestic bird and has a friendly personality.
Make a Pokemon design that features a round body and a beak, with a focus on forest habitats.
Imagine a Pokemon that combines grass and flying types, showcasing vibrant greens and soft browns.
Design an adorable Pokemon that has big eyes and a small body, perfect for a grassland environment.
Give me a Pokemon that is both cute and capable of flight, with a unique leaf-like feature.
